files.patch:
@@ -400,1 +400,1 @@
-    Reference {0} must be after an explicit constructor invocation
+    reference to {0} may only appear after an explicit constructor invocation
@@ -404,1 +404,1 @@
-    Initialized field assignment ''{0}'' must be after an explicit constructor invocation
+    assignment to initialized field ''{0}'' may only appear after an explicit constructor invocation
